name: Light in the Dark (itch) (mhunter2)
description: Light in the Dark is a single player 3d/2d side scroll game which focuses on using light as the main mechanic, letting the player control the light source and the shadow to complete puzzles and reach the end of the level. The player will control two characters one is a shadow and one is a firefly. These two simultaneous characters must work together to escape a power plant into the remains of earth.
